channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Derek Cochran

item.title: Alexa Skill Demo (Week 2)
item.description: This is part of a the Alexa Skill Demo series for Normal Community High School State Farm STEM Program. To view the steps from last session click here. Add an Alexa Skills Kit trigger Log in to the AWS Management Console and navigate to AWS Lambda Click your function in the list to open the configuration details Click Add Trigger Under add triggers, click Alexa Skills Kit to select the trigger.

item.title: Alexa Skill Demo (Week 1)
item.description: This is part of a the Alexa Skill Demo series for Normal Community High School State Farm STEM Program. To view the steps in the next session click here. Creating The Skill Function in AWS Lambda Log in to the AWS Management Console and navigate to AWS Lambda by searching for it in the search bar. Click Create function. Make sure to confirm that “Author from scratch” option is selected.
